app_descript:
App Name: Dude Perfect

App Package Name: tv.kidoodle.android.dudeperfect

Description:

Introducing the Dude Perfect mobile app, your one-stop destination for unlimited entertainment and early access to episodes from the renowned trick shot and comedy YouTube sensations, Dude Perfect. As the ultimate platform for fans, this app brings forth a family-friendly video experience, ensuring that every piece of content adheres to family values. The Dude Perfect team values its audience - you're not just viewers, you're part of the family. With a focus on customer satisfaction and continuous improvement, Dude Perfect encourages users to share feedback for a more tailored user experience.
